metadata.Title: CVE-2023-47471 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in strukturag libde265 v1.10.12 allows a local attacker to cause a denial of service via the slice_segment_header function in the slice.cc component.

criterions.comment: libde265: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
